scripts.seed: cd server && npm run strapi import -f ../seed-data.tar.gz --force
scripts.setup: npm install && npm install --prefix client && npm install --prefix server
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run develop" "npx wait-on http://localhost:1337 && cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.deploy-server: cd server && pm2 start npm --name server -- run start
scripts.deploy-client: cd client && pm2 start npm --name client -- run start
